      • createList

      • generate_request_signature

        public static java.lang.String generate_request_signature(java.lang.String requestPath,
                                                          java.lang.String apiKey,
                                                          long timeStamp)

        Generates a signature string for a Wowza Stream Cloud API request.

        This code is adapted from Generate and encrypt a signature for the request

        Parameters:
        requestPath - value
        apiKey - value (xor encoded)
        timeStamp - value
        Returns:
        the request signature

      • hmac_sha256

        public static java.lang.String hmac_sha256(java.lang.String key,
                                           java.lang.String message)
        HMAC-SHA256 generator. It gives the same output of https://www.freeformatter.com/hmac-generator.html
        Parameters:
        key - is an unique piece of information that is used to compute the HMAC and is known both by the sender and the receiver of the message.
        message - to be transmitted
        Returns:
        a Hash-based message authentication code (HMAC)
